title: Game won't startup after hitting "Launch".
body:
When I go to try and start playing League, Ill click the icon on my desktop and it will pop up. I click "Launch" and nothing happens. The screen goes down and a loading icon next to my mouse cursor starts for a few seconds then stops. The sign in screen to log in won't pop up. This has been happening for a while now. Some days it will work fine and I will be brought to the next screen but majority of the time it won't bring me to the log in screen. 
One thing I've noticed is that when I hit launch, even if the login screen doesn't pop up, if I try to launch League again it will say there is another process running as if its still running. Please help Rito....

replies.body: When you Launch, the client needs permission to open but is being blocked.  Check out the steps in our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to restore access and get this fixed up!  Let me know if you have any questions.
